LanguageData.Nearmaere_Scenario.label: Nearmare Scenario
LanguageData.Nearmaere_Scenario.scenario.name: Nearmare Scenario
LanguageData.Nearmaere_Scenario.scenario.summary: You awaken in your cryptosleep sarcophagi to the sound of sirens and ripping metal. You barely get to the escape pods before the ship is torn apart. Some time later, you land on this unknown rimworld.
LanguageData.Nearmaere_Scenario.scenario.description: You awaken in your cryptosleep sarcophagi to the sound of sirens and ripping metal. You barely get to the escape pods before the ship is torn apart. Some time later, you land on this unknown rimworld.
